attributes.action: Make all period products free for whoever may need them.
attributes.additional_details: In sexual health clinics you can receive free condoms, you cannot receive free Sanitary products...sex is a choice and periods aren't, is disgraceful that we have to pay for something that is medically necessary
attributes.background: To make all period product free for who may need them, alot of people are experiencing period poverty due to not having enough money to buy sanitary products, it may also be embarrassing for people to ask someone for sanitary products
